# rackdog_plans (Data Source)

Retrieves available hardware plans, optionally filtered by location keyword.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `location` (String)

### Read-Only

- `plans` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--plans))

- `cpu_name` (String)

- `name` (String)
- `ram` (Number)
- `storage` (Number)
